story.book.dataclient

Class ESClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.dataclient.DataClient
      • story.book.dataclient.ESClient

  • public class ESClient
extends DataClient
    ESClient is a DataClient class that represents an online storage location for Stories. Stories are saved to an Elastic Search server.
    Author:
    Vina Nguyen
